suggest.barryvdh/laravel-debugbar: To support request tracking in your Laravel app.
suggest.laravel/framework: To integrate Laravel Collection, Pagination and Eloquent relations with your models.
suggest.symfony/symfony: To integrate a ManagerRegistry, a Paginator and support serialization with your entities.
suggest.api-platform/core: To integrate a DataProvider and support the Paginator of the Api Platform in addition to the support of Symfony.
